text: Dayo Domingos António (born 20 August 1988), or simply known as Dayo, is a Mozambican footballer who plays as a Striker for Ferroviário da Beira in the Moçambola. ==International career== ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Mozambique's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:100%;" !
